questions.question: What are the different parts of an electric circuit?

choices.answer: Battery
Power source and wires
Power source, electrical devices, and conductors.
Wires, power source, and batteries.
A circuit in which there are multiple paths for current.
A circuit in which there is one path for current to flow.
Not a real circuit.
The best circuit to use.
A circuit in which there are multiple paths for current.
A circuit in which there is one path for current to flow.
A circuit where some wires are not attached.
Not a very common circuit.

questions.question: Fuses and circuit breakers are in your house in order to...

choices.answer: stop a circuit from staying on too long.
keep the circuit connected to it's power source.
break the circuit if a light turns on.
break the circuit if too much current is present.

questions.question: Your house is wired with mainly series circuits because...

choices.answer: series circuits have one path for current to travel.
series circuits have multiple paths for current to travel.
series circuits are awesome.
Your house is wired with mainly parallel circuits.

questions.question: Your house is wired with mainly parallel circuits because...

choices.answer: Parallel circuits have one path for electric current to flow
Parallel circuits have multiple paths for current to flow.
Parallel circuits are not very efficient.
Houses are mainly wired with series circuits.

questions.question: A parallel circuit is joined to 2 lights and 1 battery. One wire on the battery disconnects...

choices.answer: Current will still flow. Its a parallel circuit.
Power will work if there was a switch.
Current wont flow. Circuit is detached from the power
Only one lightbulb will light up.

questions.question: A certain pair of Christmas lights is wired with parallel circuits. One light is then removed..

choices.answer: The rest of the lights will still shine.
The rest of the lights will not shine.
There will not be enough voltage anymore.
Santa is mad at you.

questions.question: An electrician plans to wire an electric car with wires that are made of an insulator...

choices.answer: This is great. The car will drive faster.
This is not good. Electric current will flow too quickly.
This is not good. Electric current will not flow.
This is great. He saved 15% by switching to Geico.

questions.question: Which is not an electric safety tip?

choices.answer: Never use devices with damaged power cords.
With electric wires, use gloves made of conductors.
Stay away from water when using electricity.
Do not touch anything that is touching a downed wire.
